name: The SunShining Study Bible
description: A beautiful way to read, study, and memorize the Bible
author: The SunShining

shortcuts.name: The Life of Jesus Ministry
shortcuts.description: Jesus may have just lived 33 years on this earth, and He may have live over 2000 years ago. But His life still has a big impact on ours. Find out all about his life by reading through the Gosples: Matthew, Mark, Luke, and John.

shortcuts.name: How To Get To Heaven
shortcuts.description: A collection of verses and more that tell how to get to heaven.
